data_table.description: Siting Blood Pressure, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SBPBFLAG
variable.description: =1 if form is present [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPBCY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB01
variable.description: Room temperature in Celsius. Q1 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB02
variable.description: Have you smoked or used chewing tobacco or snuff within the last 4 hours? Q2 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB04
variable.description: Have you had any coffee, tea, or chocolate within the last 4 hours? [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB06
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Right arm circumference (cm). Q6 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB07
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Cuff size. Q7 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB09
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Pulse obliteration pressure. Q9 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB10
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Maximum zero. Q10 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB11
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Peak inflation level. Q11 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB12
variable.description: First blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q12 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB13
variable.description: First blood pressure measurement, diastolic Q13 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB14
variable.description: First blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q14 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB15
variable.description: Second blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q15 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB16
variable.description: Second blood pressure measurement, diastolic. Q16 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB17
variable.description: Second blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q17 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB18
variable.description: Third blood pressure measurement, systolic. Q18 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB19
variable.description: Third blood pressure measurement, diastolic. Q19 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB20
variable.description: Third blood pressure measurement, zero reading. Q20 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB21
variable.description: Computed net average of second and third blood pressure measurements, systolic. Q21 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB22
variable.description: Computed net average of second and third blood pressure measurements, diastolic. Q22 [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB03MN
variable.description: Time in minutes since last use of tobacco [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB05MN
variable.description: Time in minutes since last coffee, tea or chocolate [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: SBPB08HM
variable.description: [Preliminary measurement]. Time of day [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Sitting Blood Pressure, exam 2]
